ojc.bain

Class NeuralNetworkTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ojc.bain.NeuralNetworkTest

  • public class NeuralNetworkTest
extends java.lang.Object
    JUnit tests to test the core framework by creating a simple neural network from a LinearNeuronCollection and FixedSynapseCollection that tests communication between neuron and synapse collections over several simulation steps, using all Aparapi execution modes.
